H0.text: Whose armies were defeated at the Battle of Waterloo in 1815. Wellington

H1.text: Whose armies were defeated at the Battle of Waterloo in 1815. Blücher

H2.text: Whose armies were defeated at the Battle of Waterloo in 1815. Louis XVIII

H3.text: Whose armies were defeated at the Battle of Waterloo in 1815. Napoleón

A4.text: The French Imperial Army under the command of Napoleon I was defeated by two armies of the Seventh Coalition.

A5.text: One was a British-led force... under the command of Wellington.

A6.text: The Seventh Coalition defeated Napoleon at the Battle of Waterloo in June 1815.
